title: A view of some exceptions which have been made by a Romanist to the Ld Viscount Falkland's discourse Of the infallibility of the Church of Rome submitted to the censure of all sober Christians : together with the discourse itself of infallibility prefixt to it.
author: Hammond, Henry, 1605-1660.
publicationStmtPublisher: Printed by J.G. for R. Royston ...,
